alert.note: Alert for Piatt (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 8:58AM CST until February 27 at 7:30PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Sangamon River at Monticello affecting Piatt County. .The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sangamon River at Monticello. * WHEN...From late tonight to Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flooding of agricultural areas begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CST Friday the stage was 11.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 14.1 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Sangamon River Monticello 13.0 11.1 Fri 8 am CST 13.2 14.1 13.4 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to prepare for flooding. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation.
